he Fulfilled Heart was a matchmaking agency in the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , master smith Gyldro Angleiron of the Rivington General smithy attempted to find a mate using the services of The Fulfilled Hearts Maestro Hartstrum. Despite Hartstrums best attempts, the agency continuously failed to find anyone interested in a date with a simple blacksmith. In his letter to the proprietor of Rivington General, Maestro Hartstrum recommended Gyldro to commission a portrait that looked less like a blacksmith and more conventionally attractive. But even without a revised portrait, The Fulfilled Heart promised never to stop trying to arrange a date for the gruff melancholic man.
